markdown: MARCH 2000 ATTACHMENT A **TRADE DIRECT MARKETING (TDM) PROGRAM** **INFORMATION SHEET** (Please E-Mail Completed Form To Nikki Lall, Extension 0460, In Home Office) Date 12/29/1999 I.
